overview: John Varvaris directs Best Doctors international finance strategy and financial operations to support the company’s growth strategy. John has twenty-eight years of financial and business experience including positions as a Partner at Ernst and Young, LLP and Chief Financial Officer and Senior Vice President at Old Mutual US Life/Fidelity & Guaranty Life Insurance Company. Prior to Best Doctors, John was a Senior Managing Director of SMART Business Advisory and Consulting, LLC, where he developed and grew the firm’s national insurance practice. John graduated cum laude from Shippensburg University with a BS in Accounting and holds a his Masters of Science in Finance from Loyola College in Maryland, where he has taught graduate and undergraduate Finance courses as an Adjunct Professor.
